CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Comets relative to Golden Griffins?
SRP.A: Crimson Comets is {below} Golden Griffins in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Griffins relative to Ironwood Invincibles?
SRP.A: Golden Griffins is {above} Ironwood Invincibles in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Comets relative to Ironwood Invincibles?
SRP.A: Crimson Comets is {above} Ironwood Invincibles in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total sponsorship revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Comets}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total sponsorship revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironwood Invincibles}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Golden Griffins's minimum Sponsorship Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Golden Griffins's minimum Sponsorship Revenue is in {1966}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Comets's maximum Sponsorship Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Comets's maximum Sponsorship Revenue is in {1973}.

NC.Q: Was the total Sponsorship Revenue in 1966 higher or lower than in 1970?
NC.A: The total sponsorship revenue in 1966 was {lower} than in 1970.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1966, was the average total Sponsorship Revenue higher or lower than between 1963 and 1966?
NC.A: The average total sponsorship revenue between 1964 and 1966 was {higher} than between 1963 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1973, was the average total Sponsorship Revenue higher or lower than between 1963 and 1964?
NC.A: The average total sponsorship revenue between 1968 and 1973 was {higher} than between 1963 and 1964.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1965, did the total Sponsorship Revenue experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total sponsorship revenue between 1963 and 1965 was {smaller} than between 1967 and 1973.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Comets} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Silverleaf Sentinels and Golden Griffins first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Silverleaf Sentinels and Golden Griffins first exchanged leading positions in {1966}.
